articles.title: Living Longer, Healthier: 8 Habits That Could Extend Your Life by Decades - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Large study details life expectancy gains associated with healthy lifestyle choices. A new study involving over 700,000 U.S. veterans reports that people who adopt eight healthy lifestyle habits by middle age can expect to live substantially longer than those…
articles.content: A study of 700,000+ U.S. veterans reveals that eight specific healthy lifestyle habits adopted by middle age can substantially prolong life, emphasizing the role of lifestyle in combating chronic dis… [+4442 chars]

articles.title: Southampton: Boys who smoke risk passing on damaged genes - BBC
articles.description: Their children risk developing obesity and lung problems, say University of Southampton scientists.
articles.content:
Boys who smoke in their early teens risk passing on damaged genes to their own children, new research has found.

articles.title: COVID infection risk rises the longer you are exposed — even for vaccinated people - Nature.com
articles.description: Rigorous evidence shows that significant contact with a person with SARS-CoV-2 is more likely to lead to transmission than a short encounter.
